journal.title: Story-first hub with context-aware opens
journal.summary: Rebuilt the landing page around a structured hero, project grid, and nav that celebrate each build before handing control to the context-aware Open buttons.

journal.title: Manifests stay light inside Farcaster frames
journal.summary: BadTraders, Gen1, and Cascade all keep their mini-app manifests pinstriped while Supabase / Redis keep the heavy lifting outside the frame.

journal.title: GitHub Pages + ENS sync
journal.summary: Deployed to GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions, pointing ENS domain to the static site for simple, free hosting.

projects.title: BadTraders
projects.desc: BadTraders keeps the leaderboard data outside of the frame, pumps Supabase rows with every trade, and pins the mini-app manifest for warp-speed Farcaster launches.

projects.title: Gen1 NFT
projects.status: AI render worker · Base Pay minting flow
projects.desc: Gen1 blends Base Pay, Neynar prompts, and Redis pre-renders to hand the mini-app a hero NFT before the Farcaster frame requests it.

projects.title: Cascade Projects
projects.desc: Cascade listens to Base auction events, keeps metadata caches in sync, and primes the mini-app manifest so Farcaster frames load the auction view fast.
